english.segment1: You are Holy. God of the Heavens. Almighty. Lord of Creation. You have power. The universe displays. All things fade away. But You remain
english.segment2: And Your mercies stretch across my life. As far as I can see. And I know from experience that You are good indeed. I stand here in amazement of your awesome majesty. For words cannot describe oh God. Everything You are to me
english.segment3: You are Father. You called me Your very own. My redeemer. You left heaven's throne. My ransom. With blood for me You paid. One day unashamed. I'll see Your face
english.segment4: Indescribably good. Lord that's what You are to me. You are making me into. Just what You want me to be
english.segment5: You are Jesus. And I love You
